oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Bluegrass Nights at the Ryman (2004)
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Banjo; Bluegrass music; Logos (Symbols); Martha White Foods; Metal photoplates; Musical instruments; Ryman Auditorium (Nashville, Tenn.);
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Two color window card (black and blue - gray on white) announcing the schedule for Bluegrass Nights at the Ryman, hosted by Eddie Stubbs. Bluegrass Nights are Thursday nights at the Ryman Auditorium from June 17 to July 29 and feature performers such as Vince Gill, Doc Watson, Ricky Skaggs, Rhonda Vincent, Del McCoury Band, Sam Bush, and Ralph Stanley. Poster features metal photoplates of the Ryman Auditorium and the Bluegrass Nights logo.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Bethany Primrose
